      void createCompany(Company company)
      The method converts a Company object into a database record.

      The method gets Company by its' ID.
      Customer getCustomer(java.lang.String id)
      This method gets Customer object from the database record.
      void removeCompany(Company company)
      The method sets the state of Company, all it's coupons and the links between Customer's and Company's Coupons and between Company and Coupon as inactive.
      void removeCustomer(Customer customer)
      The method doesn't remove the Customer from the database but sets the state of the Customer and records of purchased coupons in the table customer_coupon as inactive (false) in order to keep a history of actions.
      void updateCompany(Company company)
      The method updates all the Company's attributes except of ID and name.
      void updateCustomer(Customer customer)
      The method updates Customer's data in the database according to changes that were made in the Customer object (except of ID and name).
